text: Brownie is a 1905 bronze sculpture of an elf in a pointed cap by Louis Amateis, installed at the Houston Zoo, in the U.S. state of Texas. It is one of the first publicly owned sculptures in Houston. ==See also== * 1905 in art * List of public art in Houston ==References== Category:1905 establishments in Texas Category:1905 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Texas Category:Elves in popular culture Category:Hermann Park Category:Outdoor sculptures in Houston Category:Statues in Houston
title: Brownie (sculpture)
